title: Throne Seat Cushion
description: Throne seat cushion of dark blue satin brocade. Square center panel with diapered background and large floral medallion in center. Diapers encased with single tight clouds, and each contains a stylized flower or symbol. Wider border of peonies, chrysanthemums and trailing leaves.(Cf.42.8.140). Colors pinks, blues, greens, tan, yellow, mulberry. Outer narrow border of floral sprays is boxed to fit over throne cushion. Lining of Imperial yellow satin.
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
